thread.section_title: Words Anywhere Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Words Anywhere | www.wordsanywhere.com | 2 of 139
thread.title: S. E.
thread.title_full: Words Anywhere reviewed by S. E.

author: S. E.
title: S. E.
text: The website is amazing - I love how you can actually see the font & get an estimate of sizing for your decal. The ordering was simple & easy. The shipping was fast. Only thing I would have liked is that the color would have been a bit darker. We ordered black, but it looks somewhat lighter on the walls (even though we used our paint color when designing on the website. But will likely order again and recommend to friends.
